doc:
Jackie Condon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jackie_Condon 0 John Michael Condon (March 25, 1918 – October 13, 1977) was an American child actor who was a regular in the Our Gang short series from 1922 until 1929, during the Pathé silent era. John_Michael_Condon ( March_25_,_1918 – October_13_,_1977 ) was an_American_child_actor who was a_regular in the_Our_Gang_short_series from 1922 until 1929 , during the_Pathé_silent_era .
